text: Kristen Anderson-Lopez (born March 21, 1972) is an American songwriter and lyricist. She is known for co-writing the songs for the 2013 animated movie Frozen with her husband Robert Lopez. Anderson-Lopez won the Academy Award for Best Original Song for "Let It Go" from Frozen and "Remember Me" from Coco (2017). She also won two Grammy Awards. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American songwriters Category:Writers from New York City Category:Academy Award winning composers Category:American Grammy Award winners
title: Kristen Anderson-Lopez
